TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Paridrayan, title = Paridrayan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paridrayan} }

S.FORM: alang Paridrayan ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Santimon go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 229 buwan, 733 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 98% kyan ku 718 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 2% kyan ku 15 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 95%, Rukay 1%, Bunun 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Paridrayan hya' ga Tjusepayuan. tay 'zil na Paridrayan hya' ga Cavak. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san "tuqi'"qu spzyang glgang nha qalang musa' ana inu'. basu kisya' glgan ungat kisya' nya'. spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Paridrayan ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Santimon go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 229 bowan, 733 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 98% kyan ko 718 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 2% kyan ko 15 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 95%, Rokay 1%, Bonon 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Paridrayan hya' ga Tjosepayoan. tay 'zil na Paridrayan hya' ga Cavak. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san "toqi'"qo spzyang glgang nha qalang mosa' ana ino'. baso kisya' glgan ongat kisya' nya'. spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
